rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious entry with Mediterranean style arches, natural stone finish. Connects to living area and open courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjacent to the living room with access to the central courtyard, featuring Mediterranean tiles and decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with wheelchair accessible layout; includes island counter for social interaction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Includes master bedroom, attached bathroom and walk-in closet; designed for privacy and comfort with Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms (2)
rooms.description: Two guest bedrooms on ground floor, ensuring easy access for wheelchair users. Both have en-suite bathrooms.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard designed as the heart of the house; includes seating area and greenery to promote natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ergonomic design, ample natural lighting and sound insulation, positioned for a quiet workspace.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with ramp leading into the entrance hall.
Large windows for natural light, following Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Provides an outdoor view and ventilation aligned with Mediterranean design aesthetics.
